feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:15 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 2:08 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:47 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 1:47 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:47 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
